short_summary: Engineering services for building projects in the Western Region
full_summary:
===========

**Government Tender Announcement**
====================================

* **Project Title**: EW038-230887 - Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Requests for Standing Offer (SFO)
* **Reference Number**: WS4136934019-Doc4243345132
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-10
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-24T14:00:00

**Overview**
------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites consulting firms with Electrical and Mechanical Engineering expertise to submit offers for Standing Offers for building projects in the Western Region, excluding Comprehensive Land Claim Areas, Nunavut, and Northwest Territories. The selected consultants will provide a range of services as identified in the Required Services section of this document.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

* Offerors must be licensed or eligible to be licensed to practice in the province governing each applicable zone or zones (i.e., Alberta, Saskatchewan, and/or Manitoba).
* Services shall be provided for building projects in the Western Region, excluding Comprehensive Land Claim Areas, Nunavut, and Northwest Territories.
* Up to twenty (20) Standing Offers will be authorized, four (4) in each zone, Northern and Southern Alberta, Northern and Southern Saskatchewan, and Manitoba.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

* Period of the Standing Offer: Three (3) years plus an option for two (2) one-year periods from the date of issuing the Standing Offer.
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Notice**
---------

* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer (SFO)
* Procurement Category: Construction
* Trade Agreements: Consult the attached list for applicable trade agreements.

**Contact Information**
--------------------

* Contact Name: Vinay Singh
* Email: vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: [Not available]
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Attachments**
-------------

* None

Please note that this tender announcement is for Expressions of Interest and not for bids or tenders. Interested parties must submit their offers by the specified closing date to be considered. You can find the full tender announcement on the [Government Procurement Service](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17681698?extsite=MTc2ODE2OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5M
